title: The Slime Dungeon
description: Survive in a dungeon of slimes! You are stuck with adorable creatures. How long can you survive? Built with Flutter and Bonfire engine.

title: BICOS
description: An Open Banking application developed during a hackathon hosted by TecBan (company responsible for Banco24Horas ATMs). The project won the competition by showing that users don't need to understand Open Banking to benefit from it.

title: Stone World
description: A puzzle game set in a stone world, developed with Unity 3D. Coming soon!

title: CAM Covers
description: An application that transforms ordinary photos into professional-looking album covers, inspired by real music players.

title: Virtual Pocket Air Conditioning
description: Have a virtual air conditioner in your pocket! This relaxing sound app provides better sleep. Created as a fun project to study animations in Flutter.

title: React Native - Zendesk
description: A wrapper for Zendesk SDK in React Native, making it easy to integrate customer support functionality into your mobile apps.
